elements.title: Junho and Lee Se Young’s ‘The Red Sleeve’ Ends With a Bang
elements.contents: MBC’s The Red Sleeve ended on its highest ratings yet, recording an average nationwide viewership rating of 17.4 percent. This is a triple increase from the show’s premiere rating of 5.7 percent.
